name: CupertinoMagnifier
desc: A [RawMagnifier] used for magnifying text in cases where a user's finger may be blocking the point of interest, like a selection handle.

fields.name: shadows
fields.desc: A list of shadows cast by the [Magnifier].

fields.name: clipBehavior
fields.desc: Whether and how to clip the [shadows] that render inside the loupe.

fields.name: borderSide
fields.desc: The border, or "rim", of this magnifier.

fields.name: borderRadius
fields.desc: The border radius of this magnifier.

fields.name: additionalFocalPointOffset
fields.desc: Any additional focal point offset, applied over the regular focal point offset defined in [kMagnifierAboveFocalPoint].

fields.name: magnificationScale
fields.desc: The magnification scale for the magnifier.
